archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.3.4e: e) how the critical business applications, systems and network devices handle processing errors, data in unexpected formats, and whether the errors are logged for further investigation (i.e. error handling)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
